<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>benefit_plan_breakdown</collection> <condition>MultiCurrencyUtil.isMultiCurrencyEnabled() && !gs.nil(current.demand_currency)</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="benefit_plan_breakdown">actual_benefitVALCHANGES^breakdown_type=requirement^task.sys_class_nameINSTANCEOFdmn_demand^EQ<item endquery="false" field="actual_benefit" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/> <item display_value="Requirement" endquery="false" field="breakdown_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="requirement"/> <item display_value="Demand" endquery="false" field="task.sys_class_name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="INSTANCEOF" or="false" value="dmn_demand"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Update actual cost in demand currency</name> <order>160</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) { current.actual_benefit_demand_currency = MultiCurrencyUtil.convertCurrencyUsingFxRate(current.actual_benefit, current.benefit_plan.functional_currency.code, current.demand_currency.code);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-27 19:35:43</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>3699fe415396101023beddeeff7b1222</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update actual cost in demand currency</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="PPM Standard Multicurrency" source="com.snc.ppm_multicurrency">9b30d2eb47e64210cd4e1ce4316d43b4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_3699fe415396101023beddeeff7b1222</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-07-30 03:40:20</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3699fe415396101023beddeeff7b1222"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Update actual cost in demand currency
